```{r}

library(readr)
venues <- readr::read_csv(
  'https://github.com/tonyelhabr/geekswhodrink/releases/download/data/austin-venues.csv'
)
```

```{r}
#| label: venues-table-1

venues |> 
  dplyr::select(
    `Venue ID` = venue_id,
    Name = name,
    Address = address
  ) |> 
  knitr::kable()
```
